findings.liver: Heterogeneous and echogenic; smooth contour; no mass; small amount of ascites.
findings.bile_ducts: No intrahepatic biliary dilation; CHD measures 5 mm.
findings.gallbladder: Moderate biliary sludge and stones without wall thickening.

findings.retroperitoneum: Visualized portions of aorta and IVC are within normal limits.
